segments.text: I notice the water pouring over the edge of the sink, and it’s making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already wet, but she doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall off that stool, and she’s not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware she is of everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery, and someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just turn around and see what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
